title:
Bearing, Drive Shaft in Clutch Housing,
Replace

steps.text: Remove transmission from vehicle- see operation "Transmission, Remove and Install"
Disassemble transmission - see operation "Transmission, Seal Completely"
Remove drive shaft bearing (4) and spacer sleeve (3) from clutch housing with KM-248-2 (1) and KM-248-4 (2)
Clean all removed parts and check for wear and damage; replace if necessary
Install drive shaft bearing (3) into clutch housing with KM-6120 (2) in conjunction with KM-523-1 (1). Rounded-off side (arrows) of drive shaft bearing points to spacer sleeve
Install spacer sleeve (4) into clutch housing with KM-6112 (2) in conjunction with KM-523-1 (1)
Assemble transmission - see operation "Transmission, Seal Completely"
Install transmission into vehicle- see operation "Transmission, Remove and Install"
